name: NSToolbarItemGroup.ControlRepresentation
desc: A value that indicates the display style for a grouped toolbar item.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The system dynamically changes the display mode based on the available space.

items.name: case expanded
items.desc: The system displays the subitems of a grouped toolbar item horizontally.

items.name: case collapsed
items.desc: The system displays the subitems of a grouped toolbar item as a menu.
